pkgmetadata.longdescription: Export Emissions to Atmospheric Models // Emissions are mass of pollutants released into the atmosphere. Air quality models needs emission data, with spatial and temporal distribution, to represent air pollutant concentrations. 'eixport' creates inputs for the air quality models Weather Research and Forecasting model coupled to Chemistry 'WRF-Chem' Grell et al (2005) doi:10.1016/j.atmosenv.2005.04.027, Brazilian Regional Atmospheric Modeling System with a simple photochemical module 'BRAMS-SPM' Freitas et al (2005) doi:10.1016/j.atmosenv.2005.07.017 and a line source dispersion model 'RLINE' Snyder et al (2013) doi:10.1016/j.atmosenv.2013.05.074.
